column1: Little Goat Diner////When visitors can't get a reservation at Girl and the Goat
column2: they always ask me about Little Goat. I always tell them to check the menu. I wouldn't say Little Goat is a go-to
column3: but they do have a solid menu. They have traditional things that diners usually do
column4: but also an asian fusion. Just gotta see whether it piques your interest or not. For breakfast
column5: I enjoy the chocolate chip pancakes
column6: they're fluffy and not too sweet
column7: which is the problem I encounter a lot.
